plus.sansaDescription: Sansa is the platform that references places and services useful to people in difficulty.
plus.missionsPrompt1: Referring all people in difficult situations to the structures that could help them.
plus.missionsPrompt2: To provide a tool that is open to all, ergonomic, simple and quick to use.
plus.missionsPrompt3: Provide access to a private space containing a digital safe and a list of your favourite places.

forms.iReadAndAcceptPrompt: I have read and accept the general conditions of use
forms.alreadyHaveAnAccount: Do you already have an account?
forms.passwordCharactersPrompt: Must contain 8 characters with one capital letter and one number
